BackstoryDef.title: Caravan child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a nomadic family of caravan traders. [PAWN_possessive] father, the caravan leader, taught [PAWN_objective] the caravan trade. Because [PAWN_pronoun] was able to barter or hunt for all of [PAWN_possessive] food, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to worry about growing or gathering food.

BackstoryDef.title: Caravan straggler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in a large nomadic tribal caravan, [PAWN_nameDef] often strayed behind the group, leaving [PAWN_objective] to explore... and get into trouble.

BackstoryDef.title: Trampled child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young child, [PAWN_nameDef] was caught in a muffalo stampede and was nearly crushed to death. [PAWN_pronoun] survived, but now [PAWN_pronoun] has an extreme fear of animals. While recuperating from [PAWN_possessive] many injuries, [PAWN_pronoun] discovered [PAWN_pronoun] had a talent for healing and art.

BackstoryDef.title: noble child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into tribal nobility, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] younger years pampered and protected by the tribe. Such a life teaches few skills and instills a lifelong aversion to manual labor, but [PAWN_nameDef] learned early the ways of social manipulation.

BackstoryDef.title: Chief's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to be a tribal leader. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hunt and fight from the tribe's most skilled hunters and bravest warriors. Due to [PAWN_possessive] prominent position, [PAWN_nameDef] never knew manual labor or learned many skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Child hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] followed [PAWN_possessive] father on hunting trips, learning to track and trap the most elusive of animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Child healer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] followed [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elder healer, learning to scrounge up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

BackstoryDef.title: Captive child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a youg child, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken captive by an enemy tribe during a raid. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to do hard manual labour. Over time [PAWN_possessive] new tribe became like family, and eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] was adopted as one of their own.

BackstoryDef.title: Mute
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in [PAWN_possessive] life. For many years [PAWN_pronoun] refused to speak to anyone, preferring instead to spend time with [PAWN_possessive] tribe's animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Fire-scarred child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until [PAWN_pronoun] fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to [PAWN_possessive] hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, [PAWN_pronoun] still can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease. Found alone and adopted by another group, [PAWN_pronoun] never became close with other tribe members. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to stay away from [PAWN_possessive] new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Wolf pack member
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was discarded by [PAWN_possessive] family. Raised by wolves, [PAWN_pronoun] ran, hunted, and defended [PAWN_possessive] pack. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice oracle
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen at an early age by [PAWN_possessive] village's elders to keep the sacred rituals of the Oracle. An irrepressibly curious child, [PAWN_pronoun] caused a religious crisis for [PAWN_possessive] tribe when [PAWN_pronoun] found and accidentally flipped a hidden switch that opened the "tombs" of the gods... cryptosleep caskets inhabited by some very confused ancestors.
